title: Wallace & Gromit: The Duality of Man
description:
Art can change us, shape our lives, and define our present selves. But all art is subjective, or at least so I was told. One work stands objectively above all the rest.

Credit to CaliMan for the Nathan’s Hotdog footage from Moscow.
I’ve never been there, personally, but I imagine it’s wonderful.
Also credit to Zev Shirazi for the video idea.
If you want to send ideas over to me, feel free to use twitter.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KnowledgeHubTy
